statements: SELECT * FROM documentation
SELECT doc_title, doc_content FROM documentation
SELECT doc_id, doc_created_at FROM documentation ORDER BY doc_id ASC
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE doc_id = 4
SELECT doc_title FROM documentation WHERE doc_created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT doc_id, doc_title FROM documentation WHERE doc_id = 1;
SELECT doc_title, doc_created_at FROM documentation ORDER BY doc_created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE doc_created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT doc_title, LENGTH(doc_content) AS content_length FROM documentation WHERE LENGTH(doc_content) > 100;
SELECT doc_id, doc_created_at FROM documentation WHERE doc_content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_text, document_name FROM documentation WHERE document_id = 2;
SELECT document_name FROM documentation WHERE document_id > 2;
SELECT runbook_content FROM runbooks WHERE runbook_id = 1;
SELECT runbook_title, runbook_content FROM runbooks WHERE runbook_id = 2;
SELECT document_name, document_text FROM documentation WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT runbook_title, runbook_content FROM runbooks WHERE runbook_id = 3;
SELECT document_name, document_text FROM documentation ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT runbook_title, runbook_content FROM runbooks WHERE runbook_id = 5 OR runbook_id = 7;
SELECT document_name, document_text FROM documentation WHERE document_name LIKE '%important%' AND document_text LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT * FROM documentation
SELECT issue_name, description FROM troubleshooting WHERE troubleshooting_id = 1
SELECT author, issue_name, created_at FROM runbooks WHERE runbook_id = 2
SELECT description FROM documentation WHERE doc_id = 5
SELECT * FROM troubleshooting ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE author = 'John' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT issue_name, description FROM troubleshooting WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT doc_id, issue_name, author FROM documentation WHERE author IN ('Alice', 'Bob') AND description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM runbooks WHERE author = 'Alice' AND steps IS NOT NULL ORDER BY runbook_id ASC;
SELECT issue_name, created_at FROM troubleshooting WHERE issue_name LIKE 'Database%' AND details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM documentation;
SELECT title, content FROM documentation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, created_at FROM documentation ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE title LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, content FROM documentation WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM documentation WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, title FROM documentation WHERE content LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM documentation ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, content FROM documentation ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM documentation;
SELECT title, content FROM runbooks ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM categories WHERE name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT d.title, t.name FROM documentation d JOIN document_tag_mapping m ON d.id = m.doc_id JOIN tags t ON m.tag_id = t.id;
SELECT r.title, c.name FROM runbooks r JOIN runbook_category_mapping m ON r.id = m.runbook_id JOIN categories c ON m.category_id = c.id ORDER BY r.created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM documentation;
SELECT title, content FROM documentation ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT d.title, t.name FROM documentation d JOIN document_tag_mapping dtm ON d.id = dtm.doc_id JOIN tags t ON dtm.tag_id = t.id;
SELECT r.title, c.name FROM runbooks r JOIN runbook_category_mapping rcm ON r.id = rcm.runbook_id JOIN categories c ON rcm.category_id = c.id ORDER BY r.created_at DESC;
SELECT d.id, d.title, COUNT(dtm.tag_id) AS tag_count FROM documentation d LEFT JOIN document_tag_mapping dtm ON d.id = dtm.doc_id GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY tag_count DESC, d.created_at ASC;
